[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=end-of-header.txt
actions=body-skip;end-of-message

[client10026]
port=10026
arguments=--action;skip;--body;Skip

[client10027]
port=10027

[body-skip]
command=body

chunk=Skip

response=body
n_received=2
status=continue

chunks=Skip;Skip

[end-of-message]
command=end-of-message

response=end-of-message
n_received=2
status=continue
